org.apache.giraph.comm.aggregators

类 AllAggregatorServerData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.aggregators.AllAggregatorServerData

  • public class AllAggregatorServerData
extends Object
    Accepts aggregators and their values from previous superstep from master and workers which own aggregators. Keeps data received from master so it could be distributed later. Also counts the requests so we would know when we are done receiving requests. Only restriction is that we need to call registerAggregatorClass before calling createAggregatorInitialValue, other than that methods of this class are thread-safe.

      • registerAggregatorClass

                           Class<Aggregator<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>> aggregatorClass)
        Register the class of the aggregator, received by master or worker.
        参数:

        aggregatorClass - Class of the aggregator

      • setAggregatorValue

        public void setAggregatorValue(String name,
                      org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable value)
        Set the value of aggregator from previous superstep, received by master or worker.
        参数:
        name - Name of the aggregator
        value - Value of the aggregator

      • createAggregatorInitialValue

        public org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable createAggregatorInitialValue(String name)
        Create initial aggregated value for an aggregator. Used so requests would be able to deserialize data. registerAggregatorClass needs to be called first to ensure that we have the class of the aggregator.
        参数:
        name - Name of the aggregator
        返回:
        Empty aggregated value for this aggregator

      • receivedRequestFromMaster

        public void receivedRequestFromMaster(byte[] aggregatorData)
        Notify this object that an aggregator request from master has been received.
        参数:
        aggregatorData - Byte request with data received from master

        参数:
        requestCount - Number of requests which should arrive
        taskId - Task id of master

      • receivedRequestFromWorker

        public void receivedRequestFromWorker()
        Notify this object that an aggregator request from some worker has been received.

      • receivedRequestCountFromWorker

        public void receivedRequestCountFromWorker(long requestCount,
                                  int taskId)
        Notify this object about the total number of requests which should arrive from one of the workers.
        参数:

        taskId - Task id of that worker

      • getDataFromMasterWhenReady

        public Iterable<byte[]> getDataFromMasterWhenReady(MasterInfo masterInfo)
        This function will wait until all aggregator requests from master have arrived, and return that data afterwards.
        参数:
        masterInfo - Master info
        返回:
        Iterable through data received from master

      • fillNextSuperstepMapsWhenReady

        public void fillNextSuperstepMapsWhenReady(Set<Integer> workerIds,
                                  Map<String,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> previousAggregatedValuesMap,
                                  Map<String,Aggregator<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>> currentAggregatorMap)
        This function will wait until all aggregator requests from workers have arrived, and fill the maps for next superstep when ready.
        参数:
        workerIds - All workers in the job apart from the current one
        previousAggregatedValuesMap - Map of values from previous superstep to fill out
        currentAggregatorMap - Map of aggregators for current superstep to fill out. All aggregators in this map will be set to initial value.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Prepare for next superstep
